name: Shift Princess: race car games
description:
Chariot, fairy, or mermaid - choose the required creature during the race to come first!

Who said that girls can't race? Welcome to Shift Princess - the ultimate racing games with little cuties. Choose your vehicle to win the game. Use top gear to improve your skills and to get to the rocket league! It's better than any other nfs, csr or f1 games. Three choices, one win. Try them all to become best hashiriya drifter.
